title: Community Spotlight, Soul Fighter: Fight Night

description.body: Last week we celebrated the release of Soul Fighter with Soul Fighter: Fight Night. The first of its kind, action-packed evening in which global creators from 8 regions  competed in physical and gameplay challenges. Influencers and players cheered on the competitors as they fought for the belt, and the title of Fight Night Champion.
